evidence.text:
ELIANA: I wanna finish watching the news.
EUNICE: No. Bedtime. And Marcelo, the dog goes in the garage.

ELIANA: But Mom, they're waiting for me at the net.
EUNICE: Shhh. They took your father.
EUNICE: Calm down, honey. It'll be okay. Just don't tell the little ones. They don't know what's going on.
EUNICE: That's enough, Marcelo, come to bed.

ELIANA: They're armed, Mom.
EUNICE: Best stay with your sisters.

ELIANA: Is Dad back?
EUNICE: Yes, sweetie. But don't worry, we'll be back soon.

ELIANA: Mom? 
EUNICE: Honey, are you all right?

EUNICE: Don't cry, honey. 
ELIANA: Mom, no. They said not to use the phone. C'mon, I'll go with you.
EUNICE: No, Eliana. You have to go to school. 
ELIANA: But I want to know what's happening, why Dad still hasn't--
EUNICE: -Go get ready for school, honey.
EUNICE: Your mom is taking care of this now.
ELIANA: You skipped the part about Dad and me--
